TopicTitle: can I send a craft I've built to another user?

Articles.Content: ok, so a buddy and I are collaberating on a project via skype(screen share) and I had the idea of getting a copy of the game and the same mods he has, so I could learn how to better build space craft, now what I wanted to know, is can I put together a space craft, and then send that craft to him somehow? and if so, how would I go about doing so?
Your builds are saved as text files in YourKSPFolder/saves/YourSaveName/Ships/VAB or SPH. Send them l like sharing any other file.
the only requirement is us both having the same parts/mods installed yes?

35 minutes ago, RaiderMan said:

the only requirement is us both having the same parts/mods installed yes?

Yep.
awesome. thanks for the help guys!
oh..my bad....I'm too used to forums that DONT have that feature, sorry.
